name: EventDeath
description: This event is fired when the player dies. It captures the state of the player, including their position and inventory, at the moment of death.
overview:
Fires when the player dies
Captures the exact position of death
Includes complete inventory snapshot at time of death
Provides respawn capability
Not cancellable

methods.name: respawn
toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
